## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [listMethods()](./aria2.apinamespacesystem.listmethods.md) |  | This method returns all the available RPC methods in an array of string. Unlike other methods, this method does not require secret token. This is safe because this method just returns the available method names. |
|  [listNotifications()](./aria2.apinamespacesystem.listnotifications.md) |  | This method returns all the available RPC notifications in an array of string.
